-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | generates midi from score notation.
--   
--   Library for playing scores made with 'temporal-music-notation' via
--   midi. It binds 'temporal-media-notation' and <a>HCodecs</a> packages.
--   Features composable score representation and microsound composition.
--   It relies on Midi Tuning Standart (MTS) so it's better to listen
--   results with TiMidity or another soft that undestands MTS. Examples
--   can be found source directory.
@package temporal-music-notation-demo
@version 0.2.3


-- | Library provides functions to render <a>Score</a> made with
--   'temporal-music-notation' library to midi file from <tt>HCodecs</tt>
--   package.
module Temporal.Music.Demo
type MidiNote = Note MidiId
type Instr = Int

-- | Apply midi instrument.
instr :: Instr -> Score (Note a) -> Score MidiNote

-- | Apply midi drum instrument.
drumInstr :: Instr -> Score (Drum a) -> Score MidiNote

-- | Render to <tt>Midi</tt>.
renderMidi :: Score MidiNote -> Midi

-- | File and directory names are values of type <a>String</a>, whose
--   precise meaning is operating system dependent. Files can be opened,
--   yielding a handle which can then be used to operate on the contents of
--   that file.
type FilePath = String

-- | Render <tt>Track</tt> to midi file and save results in current
--   directory.
exportMidi :: FilePath -> Score MidiNote -> IO ()
instance Show MidiVolume
instance Show MidiPitch
instance Show LowMidiNote


-- | General MIDI names
module Temporal.Music.Demo.GeneralMidi
acousticGrandPiano :: Score (Note a) -> Score MidiNote
brightAcousticPiano :: Score (Note a) -> Score MidiNote
